nodes.text: Mardona III was a planet located around the Rimma Trade Route. It was used by the Galactic Empire to stockpile equipment and materials for nearby systems. During the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry attacked Mardona III as part of its campaign named Operation Ringbreaker.

Mardona III was a warehouse world that served the Galactic Empire. It had oceans, a breathable surface and large automated facilities to supply the needs of the Empire, with megaports and large buildings.
Mardona III first appeared in the novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, which was written by Alexander Freed and published in 2015.
